article: A farmer had a cow. He _ very good care of this cow and one day when it was ill. He was very _ . He telephoned the vet . "What's the problem?"the vet _ him when he arrived. The next day he came to the _ again. The farmer was sitting outside his house and looked _ . "How's your cow?"the vet asked. "No change,"the _ said. "and I'm feeling very well myself."
